definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: debt (NH id.; Aram. h.awbo0, [[חוֹבָא]]);—[[יׇשִׁיב]] ´[[חֲבׂלָתוֹ ח]] Ez Eze 18:7 his pledge as to indebtedness he restores, v. Hi-Sm Ew:§ 291 b Ges:§ 132 R 5, b Kö:Lgb. i. 497 f. and cf. Dr:§ 193 (but constr. hard: Co [[שׁוֹב]]; dittogr. fr. ´[[חבל]] Bev:Da 1:10, cf. v:Da 1:12, v: Da 1:16).
